channel.title: Giving A real rsc character for Some Help
channel.description: I've set up my own servers, but to no prevail I always screw up in some way or the other, I am willing to give a lvl 102 Rsc character with recoveries unset for a divine server that is totally set up and can connect.... i dont want it coded or anything, just able to get online, so I can explore and experiment at codeing and stuff, so in most part i need a server, and register page that works, and can connect, please dont flame, saying omfg ur a noob learn to code, your fucking gay fail!, I dont wanna hear the shit, thats why I'm trying to learn and ive tried other ways but I like hands on learning, my msn is da_crip_king@hotmail.com if your interested.

@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“ixl p0tz ixl, post:13, topic:223614”]ty big, i thought 4 meant god or owner, but 4 didnt work and 3 did, anyways thanks alot, now i can try and learn how to code :s[/quote]dont try learning from the source, go to your local book store and buy a book on java, or read tutorials on the net about it such as the official java tutorial located at http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/index.html

item.title: Giving A real rsc character for Some Help
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“ixl p0tz ixl, post:11, topic:223614”]big i got it all, all it needed was a simple restart, but i would like ur help on some simple things to get me started if you would. For starters i went in user_credentials and changed my rank to 4, restarted server and logged in to check if i was admin, I was not, do i need a different command handler or what do I have to do? Sorry for the noob question but every1 has to learn[/quote]3 is admin and 2 is mod if i remember correctly, and you dont have to restart the server when you change things in phpmyadmin.

Read full topic
